nodes.documentation:
@title Interface for a contract that can loan tokens to a wallet.
@author Julien Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>
nodes.name: Loan
openLoan
closeLoan
addCollateral
removeCollateral
addDebt
removeDebt
getLoan

nodes.documentation:
@title Interface for a contract that can loan tokens to a wallet.
@author Julien Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>
nodes.name: Loan
openLoan
closeLoan
addCollateral
removeCollateral
addDebt
removeDebt
getLoan

devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>

addCollateral(address,bytes32,address,ui.details: Adds collateral to a loan identified by its ID.

params._collateral: The token used as a collateral.
params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral to add.
params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

addDebt(address,bytes32,address,uint256).details: Increases the debt by borrowing more token from a loan identified by its ID.

params._debtAmount: The amount of token to borrow.
params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

closeLoan(address,bytes32).details: Closes a collateralized loan by repaying all debts (plus interest) and redeeming all collateral (plus interest).

params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

getLoan(address,bytes32).details: Gets information about a loan identified by its ID.

params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

getLoan(address,bytes32).return: a status [0: no loan, 1: loan is safe, 2: loan is unsafe and can be liquidated, 3: unable to provide info] and a value (in ETH) representing the value that could still be borrowed when status = 1; or the value of the collateral that should be added to avoid liquidation when status = 2.

params._collateral: The token used as a collateral.
params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral token provided.

openLoan(address,address,uint256,address.return: (optional) An ID for the loan when the provider enables users to create multiple distinct loans.

removeCollateral(address,bytes32,address.details: Removes collateral from a loan identified by its ID.

params._collateral: The token used as a collateral.
params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral to remove.
params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

removeDebt(address,bytes32,address,uint2.details: Decreases the debt by repaying some token from a loan identified by its ID.

params._debtAmount: The amount of token to repay.
params._loanId: The ID of the loan if any, 0 otherwise.

devdoc.title: Interface for a contract that can loan tokens to a wallet.
